title: Equiniti is ready to dive in and join flotation frenzy
text:
Welcome to your preview of The Times Subscribe now Equiniti is ready to dive in and join flotation frenzy Equiniti’s chief executive, Guy Wakeley, hopes the flotation will fund the company’s expansion Martin Waller , Deirdre Hipwell Published at 12:01AM, October 15 2015 
Equiniti Group took another step towards its flotation on the London stock market in what is turning into a bumper October for initial public offerings. 
The group, which provides pensions and dividend payment services, said yesterday that its shares would be priced at between 165p and 200p. At the top of this range Equiniti would have a market capitalisation of £600 million. 
Advent International, the US private equity firm that holds a majority of Equiniti shares, has agreed to subscribe for £75 million of new shares at the offer price. The flotation will see the company raise £315 million, to Subscribe now
